RelatedSentence: Motorists traveling south bound on GA 400 can stay on the freeway and avoid surface streets now that the connector to 85 North is open .

The flyover ramps provide a smooth transition from Georgia 400 south to Interstate 85 north , and vice versa â€ and they are supposed to take as many as 6,000 cars off of the old route that includes Sidney Marcus Boulevard , the station adds .
